author: costin
msg: Check for null - because in C you don't get NullPointerExceptions :-)

author: jfarcand
msg: Add a missing doPrivileged block when package protection is enabled.

author: remm
msg: - Add static hook to retrieve the protocol handler which can be used
to generate requests. It's too complex to retrieve the protocol handler

author: costin
msg: A Server is not required for non-standalone operation. In fact, Embeded doesn't define
a server, and most apps embeding tomcat use this approach.
All we care is an Engine.

author: costin
msg: A bit more flexibility in starting ( init/start may end up beeing called twice,
that shouldn't be treated as a catastrophic event ).
Improved self-registration. My understanding is that we only need an Engine,
so if no Service exists, just go to the engine.
